original_title: 100-metres of Rajagiriya Road closed till Tuesday for pipe laying: NWSDB
original_body_lines: A 100-metre distance of the Rajagiriya Road will be closed till July 04 due to a pipe-laying activity for the Ambatale water supply project, the National Water Supply and Drainage Board (NWSDB) said.

They said the 100-metre road distance from the middle of Silva Mawatha in Rajagiriya to the Moragasmulla junction on the Welikada road will be closed. The section was closed from yesterday (June 30) at 5 p.m. until 5 a.m. on Tuesday (4).
Therefore, the NWSDB requests motorists to use alternate routes to avoid traffic on this section of the road. (CPS)
